resources.string:
StreamShare shares streaming video links to other devices. Useful if long-click=>share-url is not possible. Currently supports RTSP. 
 
 Instructions: 
	 1. On phone, find a webpage which links to RTSP stream 
		 -e.g. A streaming TV channel, radio station or camera feed

2. Click link and pick StreamShare 
	 3. Share it via email to your PC 
	 4. Use a media player such as VLC by pasting link starting with rtsp:// 
	 5. You may even be able to record your stream.
VLC => Media => Open Network Stream (Ctrl+N) => Network Protocol => Paste (Ctrl+V)
